Clear example of bad naming.


"Let's Confuse Everyone"

Introduction¶

The “moths” project serves a purpose of establishing a p2p messaging system. It includes two applications: for server-side monitoring and client access.

What’s included?¶

  • Client package
    • Subpackages
    • Submodules
  • Server package
    • Subpackages
    • Submodules

Overview¶

This messenger’s functionality is solely based on socket dialogue using python’s socket library. Client messages strictly follow jim protocol. Server-side distributes messages according to assigned recipients. In order to access chatting clients have to pass the registration procedure and log into their accounts. Client account details are stored in a general database of each server, all passwords are stored and used only hashed. Each application is accompanied with a graphical interface. Client application allows to cache active chats locally in order to minimize server requests and save memory.
